mapper.update: update slab_move_position_bunding set user_id=#{userId}, rfid=null, position_code=null, alert_key=null, alert_value=null, update_time=now() where user_ip=#{userIP}
update move_position set status='1' where id=#{movePositionId}
update slab_move_position_bunding set move_position_id=#{movePositionId},position_code=#{positionCode},alert_key='3',alert_value='已确定库位' where user_ip=#{userIP}

update stock set stock_amount=stock_amount-#{amount}, available_stock_amount=available_stock_amount-#{amount}, stock_weight=stock_weight-#{weight}, available_stock_weight=available_stock_weight-#{weight}, stock_rfid_amount=stock_rfid_amount-1, available_stock_rfid_amount=available_stock_rfid_amount-1, rfid=if(rfid!=#{rfid},if(rfid like concat(#{rfid}, ',%'),REPLACE(rfid,concat(#{rfid}, ','),''),REPLACE(rfid,concat(',',#{rfid}),'')),''), available_rfid=if(available_rfid!=#{rfid},if(available_rfid like concat(#{rfid}, ',%'),REPLACE(available_rfid,concat(#{rfid}, ','),''),REPLACE(available_rfid,concat(',',#{rfid}),'')),'') where material_code=#{materialCode} and batch_no=#{batchNo} and position_code=#{formerPositionCode} and material_type = '1'

update stock set stock_amount=stock_amount+#{amount}, available_stock_amount=available_stock_amount+#{amount}, stock_weight=stock_weight+#{weight}, available_stock_weight=available_stock_weight+#{weight}, stock_rfid_amount=stock_rfid_amount+1, available_stock_rfid_amount=available_stock_rfid_amount+1, rfid=if(rfid is null,#{rfid},CONCAT(rfid,',',#{rfid})), available_rfid=if(available_rfid is null,#{rfid},CONCAT(available_rfid,',',#{rfid})) where material_code=#{materialCode} and batch_no=#{batchNo} and position_code=#{positionCode} and material_type = '1'
update slab_operate_type set operate_type='3',update_time=now() where user_ip=#{userIP}
update slab_move_position_bunding set alert_key='2',alert_value='rfid已锁定' where user_ip=#{userIP}
mapper.select: select * from move_position where 1=1 and move_user_id=#{userId} and status ='1' and delete_flag='1'

select id,position_code as text from base_depot_position where 1=1
and position_name like concat(concat('%', #{queryString}), '%')

select count(1) from base_depot_position where 1=1
and position_name like concat(concat('%', #{queryString}), '%')
select a.* from materiel_bind_rfid_detail a inner join materiel_bind_rfid b on a.materiel_bind_rfid_by=b.id where b.rfid=#{rfid} and b.deleted_flag='1' and a.delete_flag = '1'
select material_code,sum(stock_weight) as stock_weight_sum,sum(stock_rfid_amount) as stock_rfid_amount_sum from stock where position_code=#{positionCode} and material_type='1' group by position_code

select a.id as materielBindId,a.bind_code,b.id as materielBindDetailId,b.materiel_code,b.materiel_name,b.batch_rule,b.amount,b.weight from materiel_bind_rfid a inner join materiel_bind_rfid_detail b on a.id=b.materiel_bind_rfid_by where a.rfid=#{rfid} and b.delete_flag='1'
select b.id,b.position_code,a.rfid from move_position a inner join base_depot_position b on a.former_position=b.id where a.id=#{movePositionId}
select distinct material_code as materialCode,batch_no as batchNo from stock where position_code=#{positionCode} and material_type = '1'
select b.position_code from materiel_bind_rfid a inner join base_depot_position b on a.position_by=b.id where a.rfid=#{rfid} and a.deleted_flag='1' and a.status='1' limit 1
